title: Delete PDF Pages | Remove Sensitive Sections
description: Upload a PDF, select the pages you want to delete, and download a clean document without re-running layout tools.

openGraph.title: Delete Pages from a PDF
openGraph.description: Drop a PDF, list the pages you want to remove, and download a cleaner version instantly.

images.alt: Screenshot of PDF page deletion workflow

twitter.title: Delete PDF Pages Online
twitter.description: Cut pages from PDFs without uploading to slow desktop software.

structuredData.name: Delete pages from a PDF
structuredData.description: Steps for removing unwanted PDF pages before sharing.

step.name: Upload PDF
step.text: Drop a PDF up to 20 MB into the tool to inspect its page count.

step.name: Select pages to delete
step.text: Enter page numbers or ranges (e.g., 2-4,7) to mark them for removal.

step.name: Download cleaned PDF
step.text: Generate a new PDF that excludes the selected pages.
